SEARCH

All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
CallbackHandler
The CallbackHandler interface defines methods that the controller uses to handle user actions and updates from the View.
ChooseFileDialogType
Enumeration representing the types of file chooser dialogs for choosing files.
ConfirmDialogOptions
Enumeration representing the options available in a confirmation dialog.
Controller
The Controller class manages the communication between the View and Model in the Notepad application.
FileUtil
Utility class providing file-related operations for the Notepad application.
FileUtilTest
Unit tests for the FileUtil class.
Main
The entry point for the Notepad application.
Model
Represents the data model for a notepad application, managing tabs and application settings.
ModelTest
Unit tests for the Model class.
Tab
Represents a tab in a notepad application that holds information about a document.
TabTest
Unit tests for the Tab class.
UndoableTextArea
A custom extension of JTextArea that supports undo and redo operations using an UndoManager.
UndoableTextAreaTest
Unit tests for the UndoableTextArea class.
View
The graphical user interface class for a notepad application.
